Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by Houston in 1970...
Injured on 8/8/1973 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Traded from Houston to Los Angeles on 7/31/1975 (Going to LA: 3B C. Speier, P B. Caudill. Going to HOU: P P. Edmondson)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1976, off Pete Richert (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1976, off Gary Nolan (PIT)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1976...
